Cover letter: I'm passionate individual with a strong background in data analytics, machine learning, and Python programming. I have a keen interest in leveraging data to uncover valuable insights and develop intelligent solutions. My experience includes working on projects that involve predicting real estate prices and analysis on the placement of Indian students. Throughout my journey, I have honed my skills in data analysis using libraries such as NumPy, Pandas and Matplotlib, seaborn. I am proficient in model building with frameworks like Scikit-Learn and Keras, enabling me to create accurate machine learning models. I enjoy exploring new technologies and techniques

to stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field. In addition to my technical expertise, I possess strong communication skills, allowing me to effectively convey complex concepts and work seamlessly with multidisciplinary teams. I am always open to learning and embracing new opportunities for growth and improvement. I am excited about the future possibilities in the field of data analytics and machine learning and look forward to leveraging my skills and experiences to make meaningful contributions to the industry. Ashish Pathak
